catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Junior Year
catalog_info.notes:
Verena Conley and members of the Department Successful completion of one term of French 98 or equivalent is required of all thesis-track honors concentrators in French and Francophone Studies.
This course is taught by members of the Department.
catalog_info.description: Weekly individual instruction for juniors pursuing a thesis honors track in French and Francophone Studies, culminating in the writing of a 20-25 page research paper in French.
